in_ks_log_to_ks'_le : forall (e : entry) (l : list entry) (ks : list (clientId * nat)) (id : nat), assoc clientId_eq_dec ks (eClient e) = Some id -> exists id' : nat, assoc clientId_eq_dec (log_to_ks' l ks) (eClient e) = Some id' /\ id <= id'

log_to_ks'_assoc_default_eq : forall (l : list entry) (ks ks' : list (clientId * nat)) (c : clientId), assoc_default clientId_eq_dec (log_to_ks' l ks) c 0 <= assoc_default clientId_eq_dec ks' c 0 -> assoc_default clientId_eq_dec (log_to_ks' l ks') c 0 = assoc_default clientId_eq_dec ks' c 0
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') = Some (eInput e, out) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, clientId -> nat -> output ->...-> Prop Arguments output_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope

execute_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (log : list entry) => execute_log' log init [] : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope
removeAfterIndex_partition : forall (l : list entry) (x : logIndex), exists l' : list entry, l = l' ++ removeAfterIndex l x
execute_log' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix execute_log' (log : list entry) (st : data) (l : list (input * output)) {struct log} : list (input * output) * data := match log with | [] => (l, st) | e :: log' => let '(o, st') := handler (eInput e) st in execute_log' log' st' (l ++ [(eInput e, o)]) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, list entry -> data -> list (input * output) -> list (input * output) * data Arguments execute_log' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%list_scope _ _%list_scope
